title: TUESDAY 6/29 - CARR RECRUITING ADAMS & A QB COMPETITION IN NEW ENGLAND
itunes:title: TUESDAY 6/29 - CARR RECRUITING ADAMS & A QB COMPETITION IN NEW ENGLAND
description:
Las Vegas QB Derek Carr openly recruiting his old Fresno State teammate Davante Adams... Chargers RB Austin Ekeler excited to get involved in the passing game.. Plus, a QB competition in New England.
